about.title: About me
about.content: Hi, I'm Kevin Tegar Wijanarko, but you can just call me Kevin. I am currently pursuing a degree in Informatics Engineering, with a deep passion for web development, mobile development, and data science, focusing primarily on web development. My curiosity drives me to continuously explore new technologies and push beyond my comfort zone. I have hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, PHP, Laravel, React, Python, Kotlin, Flutter, and Java, and I am on a journey to grow as a full-stack web developer. What excites me most is the challenge of transforming complex problems into clear, effective solutions. My core stack includes React, Next.js, Laravel, enabling me to build engaging and dynamic applications for both web and mobile platforms. I am also familiar with TypeScript, Python, Flask, and FastAPI. With a strong desire to keep learning and innovating, I am currently seeking a full-time position as a software developer.
about.hobby: When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing video games, watching movies and anime series
